entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Fog dissipating late this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
